actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that no limitation should be placed on the Federal income tax deduction for interest paid on a residential mortgage.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that no limitation should be placed on the Federal income tax deduction for interest paid on a residential mortgage.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that no limitation should be placed on the Federal income tax deduction for interest paid on a residential mortgage.
